The monsters of the "Dragon's Nest" are different
from those of Lestania, especially the dragons!

Fill your heart with dreams and romance while you
still can!
Don't let fear keep you from taking chances.

When the event is held again, please come back
and participate!

ship.

I don't want you to do anything dangerous, but...
it's nice to follow your dreams, isn't it?

News and visit Zerkin, who is on board the ship in
the "Cave Harbor" within the temple.

fool.

soon and preparations for departure are also
coming together.

Nest" too, you'd better be well-prepared.

"Dragon's Nest", the Harbor is always more lively
than usual.

able to stand a chance in the "Dragon's Nest".

yourself.
If you don't, you can still get a challenge you
can be proud of.
If your heart is set on it, the ship can always
set sail any time!

take on the challenge, then please enter the
mission right away.

throughout the temple to see how well you did.

話ぐらいは聞かせてくれよな
column4:
But... if you ever go there and come back, at
least tell us your story.

column3:
いよいよ出航だね――
僕はこの時の港の雰囲気がたまらなく好きなんだ
column4:
It's finally time to set sail, huh――
I really love the atmosphere of the port at this
time.

column3: 覚者さまも《竜の巣》に向かうのですか？
column4:
Lord Arisen, are you also heading to the Dragon's
Nest?

column3:
あそこに行くのは
よほど腕の立つ奴かただの命知らずだって
船乗りの兄はよく言っていました
column4:
My brother, who is a sailor, used to say that the
only people who go there are either very skilled
or just plain daredevils.

column3:
今は《竜の巣》での戦果の確認中だ！
働いた分の報酬は出るから、そう焦るな
column4:
I am currently verifying the results of our
battle at the Dragon's Nest!
Don't worry, you will receive your rewards for
the work you've done, so there's no need to rush.

column3: 《竜の巣》で大きな戦果をあげた人がいるようです
column4:
It seems that someone has achieved great results
at the Dragon's Nest.

column3:
もしかして、覚者さまが大活躍されたんですか？
ゼルキンさんからの発表が待ち遠しいですね
column4:
Could it be that the Arisen has made a great
contribution?
I can't wait for Zerkin's announcement.

column3: 船長が《竜の巣》で戦果をあげたものを確認中だ
column4:
The captain is currently confirming the
achievements at the Dragon's Nest.

column3:
《竜の巣》なんざぁ俺は行きたくないが
あそこでく繰り広げられた冒険譚を聞くのが
楽しみなんだよ
column4:
I don't want to go to the "Dragon's Nest", but
I'm looking forward to hearing about the
adventures that took place there.

column3:
今回もまた船が派手に壊れちゃったなぁ
さっそく修理に必要な見積もりを出さなくちゃ
column4:
Once again, the ship has been spectacularly
destroyed. I need to promptly request an estimate
for repairs.

column3:
船が無事に帰ってきてうれしいです
いったいどんな冒険が繰り広げられたのでしょうか？
column4:
I am glad the ship returned safely.
I wonder what kind of adventure unfolded there?

column3:
ああ、今回の取り分は送っておいたぞ！
保管ボックスから確認してくれ
column4:
Ah, I've already sent your share for this time!
Please check it from the Storage Box.

column3:
あそこはとんでもなく危険なのにまた行きたくなる
そうだろう？　覚者よ！
column4:
It's a terribly dangerous place there, isn't it?
Yet you still want to go there, Arisen?

column3:
また次の航海を思い描けば船の修理にも
自ずと精が出るというものだ！
がはははは！
column4:
Just imagining the next voyage brings vigor to
the ship repairs as well!
It's natural for spirits to rise, isn't it?
Hahaha!

column3:
おぅ、丁度、戦果の集計がついたとこだ
これはあんたの報酬だ、受け取りな
column4:
Oh, just in time. The results of the battle have
been tallied. This is your reward. Take it.

column3: 覚者さまのお名前も載っていると良いですね
column4:
It would be nice to have the name of the Arisen
included as well.

column3:
ゼルキンさんからのお知らせが
レスタニアニュースに載っています
column4:
There is an announcement from Zerkin in the
Lestania News.

column3:
あんた、ドラゴンや魔物はどうだった！？
今度一杯ご馳走するから
ゆっくり話を聞かせてくれよな
column4:
How were the dragons and monsters?!
I'll treat you to a drink next time, so take your
time and tell me your story.

column3:
船長は手に入れた報酬を
毎回、次の航海の資金にしている
column4:
The captain uses the rewards obtained
each time as funds for the next voyage.

column3:
ほんとあきれるけど
その情熱には感服するよ
column4: It's truly astounding, but I admire that passion.

column3: 海と冒険と竜との戦い、ロマンですよね――
column4:
The sea, adventure, and battles with dragons,
it's all so romantic, isn't it?

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3: 3種の宝石を集めると、より強大な竜が現れるという噂だ
column4:
Rumor has it that when you collect three types of
Gems, a more powerful dragon will appear.

column3: さらなる大物を狙うならば、挑戦するがいい！
column4: If you want to go even bigger, go for it!

column3:
噂の大物が現れたぞ！
《エルダードラゴン・ブレイズ》のおでましだ！
column4:
The rumored big fish has appeared! It's the Elder
Dragon Blaze!

column3: 討伐できれば戦功をはずむぞ！
column4: If we can subdue them, it will earn us War Merit!

column3: 勇敢なる覚者よ、竜族を狙うのだ！
column4: Brave Arisen, aim for the Dragonkin!

column3: さすれば大物、エルダードラゴンをおびき出せるはずだ！
column4:
If we do that, we should be able to lure out a
formidable creature, the Elder Dragon!

column3: 《時番》を発見したら優先的に討伐するのだ！
column4:
When you find a "Time Bonus" enemy, prioritize
defeating it!

column3: 奴らを倒せば残り時間が延長されるぞ
column4: Defeating them will extend the remaining time!

column3: おお！　ついにエルダードラゴンのお出ましだ！
column4:
Oh! The Elder Dragon has finally made an
appearance!

column3: 覚者たちよ、戦果を目指すなら討伐だ！
column4:
Arisen, if you aim for achievements in battle,
focus on defeating it!

column3:
南の森で恐ろしい魔物を見たという
噂が広がっている
column4:
People have been talking about seeing a terrible
monster in the southern forests.

column3:
まもなく討伐が開始されるだろう――
おまえも参加するならば
準備しておくといい――
column4:
The hunt will begin shortly.
If you're joining in too, be prepared...

column3:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
column4:
If the hunt has begun, visit me once again and
come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

column3:
ローガンさんが討伐準備をしている魔物は
異界を渡る力を持つそうです
column4:
The monster that ser Logan is preparing to subdue
seems to have the power to travel through
different realms.

column3:
多くの覚者さまの力が必要になるため
是非協力してあげて下さいね
column4:
We will need the power of many Arisen for this,
so please lend us your assistance.

column3:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit Ser Logan at
the White Knights' Headquarters in the Shopping
District.

column3:
そういえば、《古の祭祀場》に
強い竜力の淀みが発生していることは
知っている？
column4:
By the way, do you know that there is Dragon
Force accumulating in the "Ancient Place of
Rituals"?

column3:
オールドグロウエントか、それより
もっと恐ろしい何かか――
column4:
Old Grove Ent?
Or something even more terrifying?

column3:
白衛騎士団も確認に動いているそうよ
神殿の騎士団本部にも
情報を取りに行ってみて
column4:
The White Knights are also working to confirm
this.
You can also go to the Knights Headquarters in
the Temple to get more information.

column3:
対峙した者の話によれば
相手はケタ違いの化け物らしい
column4:
According to those who have confronted it, the
opponent is a monster of a totally different
level.

column3:
命を落とすことのないよう
十分気をつけて戦ってくれ
column4:
Please fight with utmost care, so that you do not
lose your life.

column3:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
column4:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

column3:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

column3:
ローガンさんが討伐隊を
動かし始めたみたいです
column4:
It seems that Ser Logan has started preparing for
a hunt.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にある白衛騎士団の詰所にいる
ローガンさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please check the Lestania
News and visit Ser Logan at the White Knights'
Headquarters in the "Shopping District".

column3:
《古の祭祀場》に、恐ろしい魔物が
姿を現したの！
いつものエントなど比較にならない
強大な魔物よ
column4:
A terrible monster has appeared in the Ancient
Place of Rituals!
It's a mighty monster that can't be compared to
the usual Ent...

column3:
今、神殿の騎士団本部が中心となって
討伐隊を組織しているわ
column4:
Right now the headquarters of the Temple Knight
Order is leading the way in organizing a hunting
party.

column3:
貴方もぜひ力を貸して！
このミスリウのためにも――
column4:
Please lend your strength as well!
For the sake of Mysree, too...

column3:
討伐に参加してくれた
多くの勇気ある戦士達のおかげで
あの化け物を退けることができた
column4:
Thanks to the brave soldiers who participated in
the subjugation, we were able to repel that
monster.

column3: 心から礼を言わせてもらうよ
column4: I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart.

column3:
森に現れた魔物を
退けることができたそうです
column4:
We hear that they were able to repel the monster
that appeared in the forest.

column3:
レスタニアニュースでも
取り上げられていますよ
column4: It has also been featured in Lestania News.

column3:
先の森の
魔物討伐における報酬を支給している
column4:
The reward for the forest monsters hunt is
currently being distributed.

column3:
まだのものは
保管ボックスから受け取ってくれ
column4:
Please retrieve the items that are still in the
storage box.

column3:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている――
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
column4:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

column3: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
column4:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

column3: 永遠不変をうそぶく厚顔なる白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
Oh, the arrogant white dragon, who claims to be
eternal—, and you, Arisen――

column3:
永遠なるは我が輝き、不変なるは我が志し――
思い知るがよい――
column4:
My radiance is eternal, my determination
unwavering. You shall come to know this.

column3:
うつろう世にしがみつく
哀れなる白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
Oh pitiful White Dragon and Arisen, clinging to
this fleeting world...

column3:
白がくすみ人が絶えても我が輝きは不滅――
この黄金こそが永遠の象徴――
column4:
Even if the white fades and people disappear, my
brilliance is everlasting.
This gold is a symbol of eternity.

column3: 世界は我が物と信じて疑わぬ白竜と覚者よ――
column4:
O, white dragon who believes the world is theirs
without doubt, and you, Arisen――

column3:
教えてやろう
貴様らが信じる理のもろさを――
column4:
Allow me to show you the fragility of the world
order you believe in.

column3:
伝説で語り継がれた黄金に輝く竜が
空で待っているそうだ
column4:
It is said that a legendary dragon, shining with
golden light, awaits in the sky.

column3:
相手は想像を絶する化け物だ
今から準備をはじめておくといい――
column4:
The enemy is an unimaginable monster.
It's best to start preparing now--

column3:
討伐が開始されたなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
column4:
If the hunt has begun, visit me once again and
come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

column3: 黄金の竜の討伐準備が進んでいます
column4:
Preparations for the defeat of the Golden Dragon
are underway.

column3:
一匹の魔物の討伐とは思えない
大部隊による長期戦になるそうです
column4:
It doesn't seem it'll be like defeating a single
monster.
It appears it will be a long-term battle waged by
a large force.

column3:
それでも――
伝説の竜を打ち倒すことなんて
できるのでしょうか
column4:
Even so...
Is it possible to strike down the legendary
dragon?

column3:
詳しい情報は《商店区》の
海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit Mr. Hancock in
the Shopping District near the Dragon's Portcrystal
with a view of the seashore.

column3: いよいよ生ける伝説、黄金竜との決戦だ
column4:
It's finally the decisive battle with the living
legend, the Golden Dragon.

column3:
この戦いは奴が倒れるまで戦いは引き継がれる
最後まであきらるな
column4:
This battle will not be over until they are
defeated.
We must not give up, no matter how long it takes.

column3:
挑める準備ができてるなら
さっそくミッションエントリーしてみてくれ
column4:
If you're ready to take on the challenge,
participate in the mission right away.

column3:
また自分の成果がどの程度なのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
You can also check the ranking boards located
throughout the temple to see how well you did.

column3:
黄金の竜の討伐遠征が
始まっています
column4:
The expedition to defeat the Golden Dragon has
begun.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》の海辺の見える竜の礎前にいる
ハンコックさんをお訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please check Lestania News
and visit ser Hancock in the Shopping District
near the Dragon's Portcrystal with a view of the
seashore.

column3: 戦果の報告をまとめているところだ
column4:
I'm in the process of summarizing the results of
the battle.

column3:
報酬はその後支給するので
待っていてくれ
column4:
The reward will be distributed afterwards, please
wait.

column3: 遠征が終わったようですね
column4: It seems that the expedition has come to an end.

column3: 本当にあの黄金の竜を倒せたのでしょうか――
column4: Did we really manage to defeat the Golden Dragon?

column3:
先の黄金竜討伐に対する
報酬を支給中だ
column4:
Rewards for the recent defeat of the Golden
Dragon are now being distributed.

column3: 保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
column4: Please retrieve it from the Storage Box.

column3:
黄金竜討伐の戦果に対する
報酬を支給する
column4:
The reward for the successful elimination of the
Golden Dragon.

column3: 協力に感謝する――ありがとう
column4: We appreciate your cooperation. Thank you.

column3:
先の遠征における戦果が
発表されています
column4:
The results of the recent expedition have been
published.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので
レスタニアニュースより確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are being paid, so please check it out in
Lestania News!

column3: 完全なる者たちは何処に――
column4: Where are the perfect ones...

column3:
我に完全を与える主よ――
ここにはいないのか――
column4:
O Lord, grant me perfection—
Is it not here—

column3:
戦いは永遠を知る方便――
空しさなど覚えるものか――
column4:
Battle is the means to know eternity――
Why remember emptiness――

column3:
私の予感だが、ほどなくレスタニアに
暗雲が立ち込めようとしている
column4:
I have a feeling that soon, a dark cloud will
loom over Lestania.

column3:
これは凶悪な魔物があらわれる前兆だ
気をつけるといい
column4:
This is an omen of the coming of a vicious demon.
Be careful.

column3:
魔物が姿を現したならば
再度、私の元を訪れて
討伐隊への参加を期待しているぞ
column4:
If the monsters show themselves, I hope you'll
visit me again and join the hunt team!

column3:
レスタニアで恐ろしい気配を感じたという
噂が流れています
column4:
Rumors are circulating of a frightening presence
in Lestania.

column3:
詳しい情報は
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
column4:
For more information, please visit ser Cornelia
in the "Shopping District"

column3:
つい最近、レスタニアで
恐ろしい魔物の気配を感じたという
報告が舞い込んできたのだ
column4:
We have recently received reports of a terrifying
demonic presence in Lestania.

column3:
恐るべき魔力の息吹を持つという噂もある
十分に気を付けるといい
column4:
There are rumors that it possesses a breath of
fearsome magical power. It would be wise to be
extremely cautious.

column3:
挑める準備と覚悟ができたなら
さっそく討伐隊に参加してくれ
ファビオ様は重大な用ゆえ
私が窓口を任されている
column4:
If you are prepared and ready for the challenge,
please join the hunting party right away.
Lord Fabio has urgent matters to attend to, so I
have been entrusted with handling the
arrangements.

column3:
また自分の成果がどれほどなのかは
神殿内の各所にあるランキングボードを
確認するといい
column4:
Also, you should check the ranking boards located
throughout the Temple to see how well you did.

column3:
恐るべき異界の魔物の気配が
確認されているそうです
column4:
It seems that the presence of fearsome enemy
creatures from the Other World has been confirmed.

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを確認の上
《商店区》にいるコーネリアさんを
お訪ねください
column4:
For detailed information, please check Lestania
News, then visit Ms. Cornelia in the Commercial
District.

column3:
何とか退けることができたようだな
さすがだ、覚者よ
column4:
It seems that you were able to somehow fend it
off. Truly impressive, Arisen.

column3:
戦果を集計しているところだ
報酬支給はもう少し時間をくれ
column4:
We are currently tallying the results of the
battle. Please give us a little more time for
reward distribution.

column3:
ただいま魔物と交戦した方々の戦果を
集計しています
column4:
We are currently calculating the results of those
who have fought monsters just now.

column3: 発表まで今しばらくお待ちください
column4:
Please wait a little longer until the
announcement.

column3:
魔物討伐の報酬が支給されている
保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ
column4:
The reward for defeating the enemies has been
paid. Please accept it from the Storage Box.

column3:
先の戦闘評価が終わっている
報酬を支給するので受け取ってくれ
column4:
The previous combat evaluation has ended. Please
collect the reward.

column3: 先の魔物討伐の戦果が発表されています
column4:
The outcome of the previous enemy subjugation has
been announced.

column3:
報酬も支給されていますので、
レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
column4:
Rewards are also being paid, so please check it
out on Lestania News!

column3: オマイラ――覚えとけよ！
column4: You all―― remember this!

column3: おいおい――調子にのるなって
column4: Hey hey, don't get carried away.

column3: 腐ってもやっぱり覚者か！？
column4:
Even if you're rotten, you're still an Arisen,
huh!?

column3:
２つ以上のミッションには
エントリーできないぞ
column4: You can't enter more than one mission!

column3:
先にエントリーしている方のミッションを
終わらせるか、エントリーを取り消して
再度こちらに来るんだ
column4:
Either finish the mission you've already entered,
or cancel your entry, then come back again.

column3:
ボルド大坑道へ調査にいったゲルト団長から
緊急指令が届いているんだ
column4:
I've got an urgent order from Commander Gerd, who
